title: Modern Bright & Spacious Private Valley Studio - UTILITIES INCLUDED FREE!
posting_body: $2500/month rent plus 1500 security deposit upon signing lease.
ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED: Electricity, water, heat, trash, internet).
Also available for month-to-month rental and weekly stays!

Fully furnished spacious and bright studio complete with private keypad self-entrance, comfortable queen bed, large closet, luxury bathroom and shower, sofa/futon, kitchenette with sink, full refrigerator, microwave, kettle, electric burner, HD TV with access to Netflix and other apps along with fast complimentary guest Wi-fi.
Close to shops, restaurants, Sherman Oaks Galleria and Northridge/Topanga Malls, and major freeways.
Short drive to Hollywood, Los Angeles, beach cities and more.
This is a non-smoking unit and strictly enforced.
PETS OK: We allow up to two house-trained dogs or a cat.
Tenant must agree to and pay an additional pet cleaning fee and pet deposit (refundable).
